summary: This appears to be a New York City Police Department (NYPD) arrest report or booking document for Jeffrey Epstein. It contains his personal details, charges, and booking information from April 28, 2017.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein

events.title: Jeffrey Epstein Arrest/Booking
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was processed by the New York City Police Department. The document lists charges and his personal details.

keyFacts: This is an NYPD document dated April 28, 2017, related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The document appears to be an arrest report or booking sheet containing Epstein's personal details (e.g., sex, hair color).
The document lists charges, though the specific charge codes (e.g., 'PL 130.20', 'PL 130.52') are partially legible but suggest sex crimes under New York Penal Law.
The report indicates the case was 'OPEN' as of the document date.
The document ID is 71707901, and it is associated with NYPD commands SOMU and SOD.
